channel.title: Need Help with two Things
channel.description:
Hello, First i want to say thanks for reading my topic. Even if you cant help, thanks for trying :) [u] [b]Problem 1[/b] [/u] - I need an anti mass code.. something like if you click over a certain speed, within a few seconds, like 10 clicks within 2-3 seconds, than it says in txt4 "oh god, im massing" and adds a black mark to there account.
[u][b]problem 2[/b] [/u] - I need to add a Woodcut that has a timer, like when you cut the tree, all you have to do is click once, and it cuts maybe 30 logs, than says "the tree has run out of logs" or somthing.
PLEASE help me if you can, otherwise, thanks anyways.

item.title: Need Help with two Things
item.dc:creator: @flargie flargie
item.description:
@flargie wrote:

Hello, First i want to say thanks for reading my topic. Even if you cant help, thanks for trying

Problem 1 - I need an anti mass code… something like if you click over a certain speed, within a few seconds, like 10 clicks within 2-3 seconds, than it says in txt4 “oh god, im massing” and adds a black mark to there account.

problem 2 - I need to add a Woodcut that has a timer, like when you cut the tree, all you have to do is click once, and it cuts maybe 30 logs, than says “the tree has run out of logs” or somthing.

PLEASE help me if you can, otherwise, thanks anyways.
